Package bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.data

package bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.data
  • Class
    Description
    BookDataManager
    This class is used to load and store data using the text file storage.
    DataManager
     
    LibraryData
    LibraryData class is responsible for loading data to and storing data from the library, using the text file storage.
    LoanDataManager
    This class is used to load and store data using the text file storage.
    It is an implementation of the DataManager interface.
    It has a RESOURCE field that holds the path to the text file (loans.txt) that will be used as storage for loans data.
    The loadData(Library) method loads data from 'loans.txt' file to the library.
    The storeData(Library) method stores the book data that exist in the library to 'loans.txt' file.
    PatronDataManager
    This class is used to load and store data using the text file storage.
    It is an implementation of the DataManager interface.
    It has a RESOURCE field that holds the path to the text file (patrons.txt) that will be used as storage for the books data.
    The loadData(Library) method loads data from 'patrons.txt' file to the library.
    The storeData(Library) method stores the book data that exist in the library to 'patrons.txt' file.
